definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: China's iron-ore import volumes actually fell in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 中國2010年鐵礦石進口量反而下降。

sentences.english: Beijing has not said the detentions are tied to iron ore negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 北京方面並沒有說拘留跟鐵礦石談判有關。

sentences.english: Bigger cost would come from further monopolization of iron ore market.
sentences.chinese: 更大的損失將來自於進一步壟斷的鐵礦石市場。

sentences.english: Copper-iron oxide ores are classified as refractory ores.
sentences.chinese: 氧化銅鐵礦石屬難選礦石。

sentences.english: The determination method of total iron in imported Mongolian iron ore by indirect iodometry was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用間接碘量法測定蒙古鐵礦石中全鐵的方法。

sentences.english: Ironstone is primary original material of metallurgy enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 鐵礦石是冶金企業生產的主要原材料。

sentences.english: The new increase would see contract prices for iron ore range around $140 a metric ton.
sentences.chinese: 漲價後，鐵礦石的合約價將達到每噸140美元左右。

sentences.english: Imports of soybeans have risen 55% and iron ore 24%.
sentences.chinese: 大豆和鐵礦石進口分別增長了55%和24%。

sentences.english: China to pour more cash into overseas iron ore.
sentences.chinese: 中國擬投巨資海外開採鐵礦石打破三巨頭壟斷。

sentences.english: Elimination of the interference of slimes is the key in the flotation of finlegnained hematite ores.
sentences.chinese: 排除礦泥的干擾，是浮選細粒紅鐵礦石成功的關鍵。

sentences.english: The coke combustion process in iron ore sintering is dependent on the coke size.
sentences.chinese: 鐵礦石燒結中焦粉的燃燒過程取決於焦粉的粒度。

sentences.english: To pick it up, you'd think there was a collection of large iron ore-bearing rocks inside.
sentences.chinese: 拎一拎，你肯定會認爲裏面裝的都是大塊兒的鐵礦石。

sentences.english: The analytical scheme of magnetite in iron ores by means of the chemical separation has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了用化學分離法測定鐵礦石中磁鐵礦的方案。

sentences.english: I would like to know if MOFCOM has any rectification measures in the pipeline concerning import order of iron ore.
sentences.chinese: 請問商務部在鐵礦石進口方面有沒有規劃秩序的整頓？

sentences.english: This method was used for the analysis of ferrous valences in iron ore sample with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 此法用於鐵礦石樣品中鐵的價態分析，結果令人滿意。

sentences.english: Hanna furnaces of the Great Lakes Steel Corporation, stock pile of coal and iron ore.
sentences.chinese: 巨河鋼鐵公司，漢娜鍊鋼處，堆積的煤和鐵礦石。

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Dian4 wang3 Gong1 si1
